markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Hunter's Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=5090) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ranger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=215)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Hunter's Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=5088)

</column>

---

You gain one ranger feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your ranger level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another ranger feat.
name: Advanced Hunter's Trick
